name: King's Quest - Chapter 2: Rubble Without a Cause
name_original: King's Quest - Chapter 2: Rubble Without a Cause
description:
King's Quest - Chapter 2: Rubble Without a Cause is an adventure game developed by The Odd Gentlemen. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Sierra Games.
You can play King's Quest - Chapter 2: Rubble Without a Cause on PC and PlayStation 3.
